charges.charge_description: 21:846=CD.F CONSPIRACY TO DISTRIBUTE CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-21 USC 846-Felony-Knowingly conspired to possess with intent to distribute and distribute oxycodone (May 16, 2002) (1)
21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-21 USC 841(a)(1)-Felony-Knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute and distribute oxycodone (May 16, 2002) (2)

18:924C.F VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN-18 USC 924(c)(1)-Felony-Knowingly used and carried during an in relation to, and possessed in furtherance of a drug trafficking crime, a firearm (May 16, 2002) (3)

18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.-18 USC 2 and 922(g)(3)-Felony-Knowingly possessed a firearm while being an unlawful user of a controlled substance-(May 16, 2002) and Count 5-21 USC 853-Forfeiture (4)
Possession of firearm during a drug trafficking offense and distribute a controlled substance in violation of 18 USC 924(d) &; 21 USC 841(a)(1) &; 841(b)(1)(C) [1:02-m-52]
